level.heading: Imposition of tax; additional levy on transfers; credits; restriction; tax not to exceed difference between maximum credit and levy by states; benefits to District; tax on transfer of nonresidents' real and personal property; executor to file copy of federal return with Assessor; assessment on basis of return; tax payable within 17 months.
Legislative History of Law 6-168
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-168, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1901.
